shared.locations

Class HexLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.locations.HexLocation

  • public class HexLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable representation of the location of a hex on a hex map

      • getDistanceFromCenter

        public int getDistanceFromCenter()
        Tells you how many hexes away from the center this location is.
        Returns:
        the distance from the center. 0 if the location IS the center.

      • locationsWithinRadius

        public static java.lang.Iterable<HexLocation> locationsWithinRadius(int maxRadius)
        Returns an iterator of all locations within a certain distance of the center Iterates in a clockwise outward spiral pattern, from the top in each circle
        Parameters:
        maxRadius - the maximum distance from the center allowed in the iterable.
        Returns:
        an Iterable over all HexLocations within the given radius.
